SEG.ORIGINAL_TEXT: Shine sheikh ibrahim dan shehu Adullahi Inyass.
An Haifeshi Agarin (daiban yasin) gari ne da mahaifinsa yakafa a kaulakh dake kasar senegal.
Yatashi akan kularwar mahaifinsa, ya Haddace Al-Qurʼani a Hannun mahaifinsa Acikin kananan shekaru Ya wallafa littafi A rana daya yana da shekaru 21 aduniya.
Ya turo ilimi Zahiri dana Badini Har Yazama baida Tamka a Fagen ilimi a duk duniya.
Yazama Gagara Misali acikin son Manzo Allah (SAN) da yabonsa.
Faiyar da Shehu Ahmadu Tijjani mai Darika yai Bushara da Zuwanta ta Bayyana a Hannunsa a HiJra 1348.
Yayi HIJra daga garinsu Kaulaka Ranar Safiyar Sallah 1939.
Yatafi HaJJin Farko 1937 kuma a wannan shekara ce ya hadin da sarkin kano shehu Abdullahi Bayaro (sarkin AlhaJi) wanda yai Asalin shigowar shehu Nigeria
Shehu yai wallafa littafai Ba’ adadi daga cikin akwai, shahararren Duwaninsa da Kashiful ILbas da Ruhul –Adat .
Yaba″YAya 75 MAZA da MATA ya rayu shekaru 75 yarasu A Asibitin London Rana 15 ga Rajab.An rufeshi A Madinarsa a Gaban Masallacinsa Raularsa ta Zama Abin Ziyara a Kowa ne Lokaci
DON KARIN BAYANI A ZIYZRCI WWW.AL-FATIMIYYA.ORG
ALLAH yasaka maka da Alherinsa yakuma karamaka son manzon ALLAH (S.A.W).
ALLAH YA KARA MUNA SON ANNABI DANA IYALEN GIDAN SA, YAKUMA SANYA MU A KAN HANYA ZUWA GA SAYYADUL WUJUD (S.A.W).
Allah yasaka da alkhairi, Allah ya qara mana qaunar Annabi MOHAMMAD {S¤A¤W} 08032904972
Assalamu alaikum, duk abin da ka fada hakane saboda na ziyarci gidan shiek ibrahim inyass a ungwar madinah,garin kaulak a kasar senegal 1999.
Sunana idris abdulamalik na zauna a gidan kusa da dakin mustapha inyass na yi satitika a gida n kafin in wuce gambiya .
Allah yakara taimakon ka kuma ya sa shi jannatul fiddausi .ameen.08086236559
Mun kuma gode da aikin da kai
MASHA ALLAHU MUN GODE da Gaishe gaishe da kuke yi mana, Allah ya barmu tare.... Alfarman fiyayyen halitta (S.A.W) 08095441916 ko kuma 08137964432

Allah yasakama da mafificin lada ya qarawa shehu karama da daukaka yaimana arzikin cikawa da kalmar LA_ILAHA ILLAH MUHAMMADAR RASUL ULLAH (S.A.W) albarkacin khairu kalqilla MUHAMMADAR RASUL ULLAH (S.A.W).

Allah yayiwa babban sheikh dinmu, kuma dattijo, sarkin zakiran africa rasuwa wato SHEIKH ALIYYU_HARAZIMI_HAUSAWA DAKE GARIN KANO , yarasu yau 8 safar 1435=11 dec 2013 da Asubah, anyi janaʼizar sa yau da misalin karfe 10:00 na safe.
Kai masa gafara ka kyautata makwancinsa kakuma sadashi da babban masoyinsa kuma masoyin mu ANNABI MUHAMMADU
Masha Allah gaskiya munyi farinciki maitarin yawa bisa qoqarin dakayi don kawo mana wannan tarihi.
